NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 DAZ: My love, is there a voyager stone to the Sanctuary somewhere in the Deep Storm Station? 2 1 DAZ: It appears there are still several of the native species inside the Sanctuary who have grown too used to the space, and elude release back to the surface. We require more eyes to assist in their release! 3 2 CASSAVA: It appears there is one here, Daz. Hah.. Did you leave this voyager stone here in an attempt to slyly encourage me to join you? Your efforts to lift my low spirits are steadfast, but unsubtle, my love! 4 3 CASSAVA: I would love nothing more than to join you in assisting Oeno, Daz. But.. I do not feel I can allow myself such joy right now. 5 4 DAZ: My love.. The failure of the Ash Twin Project was not your fault. We must not be weighed by failure: we can only keep learning from our experiences, and trying new solutions! 6 4 DAZ: Poke, Pye and Clary are already exploring the newly arrived comet at this very moment. Imagine what knowledge we may 7 6 CASSAVA: Daz? Did something interrupt your thought? Your voyager is still here in the Deep Storm Station.. 8 7 CASSAVA: Daz? What's wrong? Daz? WorkshopTop EX3 8 CONV R4 8 Workshop R2 8
